content: {A笑哈哈}<style=SizeBig>Ka-ching!</style> The crops you've so carefully tended to with all that watering have found their way to where they're most needed today.
info: 第一次光顾菜市-格连_主流程文本3

content: Just a heads-up, the crops in high demand change on a daily basis and vary from planet to planet. If you have time, pop over to the <style=Highlight>Today's Greenmarket on your friends' planets</style> to see what's in demand!
info: 第一次光顾菜市-格连_主流程文本3
